claim: Dungeons & Dragons was designed by Gary Gygax and Dave Arneson.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Ernest Gary Gygax  (  -LSB- ˈɡaɪɡæks -RSB-  )   (  July 27 , 1938 -- March 4 , 2008  )  was an American game designer and author best known for co-creating with Dave Arneson the pioneering role-playing game Dungeons & Dragons  (  D&D  )  .

claim: Dungeons & Dragons was designed by Gary Gygax and Dave Arneson.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Dungeons & Dragons  (  abbreviated as D&D or DnD  )  is a fantasy tabletop role-playing game  (  RPG  )  originally designed by Gary Gygax and Dave Arneson , and first published in 1974 by Tactical Studies Rules , Inc.  (  TSR  )  .

claim: Dungeons & Dragons was designed by Gary Gygax and Dave Arneson.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The first edition was written by J. Eric Holmes based on Gary Gygax and Dave Arneson 's original work .
